biotools.summary: A knowledge resource on cell lines. It attempts to describe all cell lines used in biomedical research, including immortalized cell lines, naturally immortal cell lines (ie stem cell lines), finite life cell lines when those are distributed and widely used, vertebrate cell lines with an emphasis on human, mouse and rat cell lines, and invertebrate (insect and tick) cell lines.

bioschemas.name: Cellosaurus
